Package com.brightcove.player.captioning

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrightcoveClosedCaption
    A class for describing a closed caption, comprised of a start and end time as well as the caption text.
    BrightcoveClosedCaptioningOptionsDialog
    A DialogFragment for presenting styling options for closed captioning, and allowing them to be saved and loaded from the application.
    BrightcoveClosedCaptioningStyle
    A class that represents the styles applying to Closed Captions are to be presented to the user during video playback.
    BrightcoveClosedCaptioningStyle.Builder
    Builder class for CaptionsStyle objects.
    BrightcoveClosedCaptioningTextView
    A TextView that encapsulates a rendered closed caption.
    LoadCaptionsService
    Provides a simple interface to load and parse caption documents.
    TTMLParser
    Implementation of a parser which understands much of the DFXP TTML specification (though not all).
    TTMLParser.Attributes
    All XML attributes recognized in a TTML document.
    TTMLParser.Namespaces
    Namespaces specified by TTML specification.
    TTMLParser.Tags
    All tags recognized in a TTML document.
    WebVTTParser
    Implementation of a parser for WebVTT style captions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BrightcoveClosedCaptioningOptionsDialog.ClosedCaptioningOptionsType  
    BrightcoveClosedCaptioningTextView.EdgeAttribute
